description.value: When you succeed at identifying a creature using Recall Knowledge, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's mastermind racket for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.
